### Task Details
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(knitr); library(dplyr); library(scales)
items <- params$items %>%
  mutate(Date = as.character(Date),
         Hours = round(Hours, 2),
         Rate = dollar(Rate),
         Amount = dollar(Amount)) %>%
  select(Date, Description, Hours, Rate, Amount)
kable(items, align="l", booktabs=TRUE)
```
